Articles.Content:
So, instead of making and asteroid catcher ship thinggy with the recent update, I made this! A rather large military vessel known only as the Titan (Currently).

This behemoth comes equipped with two small hangars on both sides, 2 Unguided Ragnarok Missiles, 4 Guided Thainx Missiles, and 4 Anti-Fighter Missiles.

It has 8 Nuclear thrusters and one ks-25 (At least I think that's the one)

And let's just say it took a bunch of rockets to get this into orbit...

...Lots of them.

V Craft File! V

http://www./view/19wvod...an_Mrk_1.craft

Edited April 4, 2014 by Chozo Nomad
Hmm, I also was one to not make a asteroid station, I made a saturn V. But that doesn't mater, nice job, better than me. How many fighters can it hold?
Use it to catch an asteroid! Or quicksave and let a class A punch right through it!
Cool,the first 3m part ship.Can you tell some stats(Mass,parts,D/v).I'm now wondering what the TWR of each of the boosters are.I chose to try out other parts of the update.

Cool,the first 3m part ship.Can you tell some stats(Mass,parts,D/v).I'm now wondering what the TWR of each of the boosters are.I chose to try out other parts of the update.

http://i.imgur.com/sStoWfv.png

Actualy I posted my 3 meter cannon battleship yesterday on your new battle thread.
Oh it just doesn't look like it is.

Oh it just doesn't look like it is.

YepÃ¢â‚¬Â¦the Triumphant uses the large 3 meter fuel tank.

Hmm, I also was one to not make a asteroid station, I made a saturn V. But that doesn't mater, nice job, better than me. How many fighters can it hold?

Up to 4 small fighters. 2 on each side. I'll have pics up with the craft file later tonight.
Can't wait for the download. I'm currently trying to do something similar, and just having a hell of a time covering up the whole outside and making it not look like crap.

Here we are! Download link and then some.

Titan Assault Carrier: http://www./view/19wvods8xg70dt9/Titan_Mrk_1.craft

Heavy Refueler: http://www./view/vr31a75qn2w439q/Heavy_Refueler.craft

Hound Fighter

The fighters are rather smallish and kind of hard to use, but they come with the heavy refueler. And, as you can see, It's a bit of a tight fit. The torpedoes are Macey Dean's standard torps and require manual firing and un-docking.

I recommend you pushing to 15000 Meters before starting a gravity turn With the Titan. Otherwise atmospheric drag is just too much.

Random Stats:

Part Count:Around 380 without fighters

Mass:478.81 Tons

D/V: ...unknown at this time...

User Manual:

1- Fires Ragnarok Missiles

2-Fires outer most Thainx Missiles in 'dumb fire' mode.

3-Separates both Thainx missiles from docking ports. Manual operation required to use this set. It's reccomended to use these ones for targets just to either side of the bow, otherwise you're likely to hit the cowling of the hangars.

0- Toggles Solar Panels

9- Toggles Nuclear Thrusters

Edited April 4, 2014 by Chozo Nomad

"Evil laugh" I can finally start the creation of the infinity-class I scrapped dozens of times.

Time to download ARM.
